name: Broccoli-­Cheese Soup
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 cup chopped carrots
4 cups chopped broccoli 1/2 cup chopped celery
1/2 -­‐ 3/4 cup flour (depends on desired thickness 1/2 cup butter
4 cups milk or cream (I like 1 cream, 3 milk) 2 cups grated cheddar cheese
steps: Steam vegetables on low with small amount of water until tender. On medium heat in a separate saucepan make
cream sauce of flour and butter. Add the chicken broth and milk/cream to cream sauce. Mix until thickened.
Add cheese and stir until creamy smooth. Add the steamed vegetables. Salt and pepper to taste.
